tool_description: The Website Classification API utilizes cutting-edge machine learning techniques to automatically analyze and categorize web content, including text and multimedia materials. By leveraging powerful algorithms, this API enables users to efficiently classify websites and content, saving time and effort in the process.

api_list.name: Domain Classification
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve information about a domain and enrich your databases with data from a company. By passing the domain, you will receive information such as business category and IAB categorization.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The domain that you want to classify. (e.g., https://google.com)
